itemLabel: Aubrey Buxton, Baron Buxton of Alsa

wikipedia_page.main: Major Aubrey Leland Oakes Buxton, Baron Buxton of Alsa  (15 July 1918 – 1 September 2009) was a British soldier, politician, television executive, and writer.

response: ** Aubrey Buxton, Baron Buxton of Alsa, British soldier, politician, television executive and writer (d. 2009)
* Aubrey Buxton, Baron Buxton of Alsa (1918–2009), British soldier, politician, and television executive

Three other members of the family have been elevated to the peerage. Sydney Buxton, 1st Earl Buxton was the son of Charles Buxton, third son of the first Baronet. Noel Noel-Buxton, 1st Baron Noel-Buxton was the second son of the third Baronet. Aubrey Buxton, Baron Buxton of Alsa, was the son Leland William Wilberforce Buxton (1884–1967), youngest son of the third Baronet.
